data.comment: Blackburn make their first substitution with Lewis Holtby replacing Tom Trybull.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Huddersfield.
Darragh Lenihan (Blackburn) has received a yellow card from Matt Donohue.
In the minute 53, Goal! Naby Sarr gives Huddersfield a 1-0 lead.
At John Smith's Stadium, Fraizer Campbell has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Bradley Dack is replacing Harvey Elliott for the away team.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Joe Rothwell with Sam Gallagher. This is the third substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
The away team replace Ryan Nyambe with John Buckley.
Huddersfield's Jonathan Hogg has been booked in Huddersfield.
In the minute 72, Stewart Downing is on a sub for Daniel Ayala for Blackburn.
Aaron Rowe is replacing Isaac Mbenza for Huddersfield at John Smith's Stadium.
Sam Gallagher levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 89, The home team replace Juninho Bacuna with Alex Pritchard.
Lewis Holtby for Blackburn has been booked by Matt Donohue and receives a first yellow card.
Naby Sarr puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a third substitution, with Jaden Brown replacing Carel Eiting.
